bind.jr:constraintMsg: The worker ID must be 4 characters and follow this format: 2###
The worker ID must be 4 characters
You must enter alphabetical characters only.
You must enter alphabetical characters only.
You must enter a valid year of birth.
You must enter a valid phone number.

select1.label: Do you have a QR code with your worker ID?

input.label: Manually write your 4 digit field worker ID
input.hint: This is the worker ID you have been assigned for this project. You can find it in the QR code card.

input.label: Scan your field worker ID QR code
Stand just outside the front door of the house and geocode the location.

Do you have material to assign a household ID?

input.label: Assign household ID in a visible area
Do not go forward with data collection until the house has been assigned a household ID

Household members refer to the total number of people who belong to the household, including residents (members intending to sleep in the household in the following 3 months) and non-residents (members not intending to sleep in the household in the following 3 months).

How many resident members does this household have?
How many non-resident members does this household have?
